Class Jacksonizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.commons.jackson.Jacksonizer

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
@Immutable
@Beta
public final class Jacksonizer
extends Object
    Utility class to provide a simple interface to Jackson methods
    Author:
    David Leoni
